hero.headline: Make payments right from your phone.
hero.sub-copy: Wherever your money’s headed, we’ll make sure it gets there safe, sound and right on time.

the-friend.headline: TO THE PAYER, GO THE REWARDS.
the-friend.body: Transfer money between other Tend members instantly—for free. Perfect for splitting the bill, sending the rent or settling the score.

value-props.label: Ace the traditional transfers.
value-props.body: Old-fashioned money transfers, meet Tend. You won't have to step foot in a bank to wire money or pay a bill again. And (Coming soon) you can deposit a paper check right from your Tend app.

value-props.label: Send all over the map.
value-props.body: The Tend app will hook you up with the fastest (and cheapest) ways to send money across the globe. But for now you can try Transferwise or Remitly

value-props.label: More ways than one.
value-props.body: All Tend members will have access to Venmo and PayPal, as well as virtual cards with Google and Apple Pay.

shares.headline: Let’s get the whole squad on the same page.
shares.body: Paying friends, hair stylists and babysitters is easier when everyone has Tend. You’ll earn a cash bonus and a Tend Share for every member you refer, and that share will earn you cash every month. So, go ahead, split the bill eight ways.
